page.title: 01Oulton and Woodlesford.
page.content: Oulton and Woodlesford were formerly 2 villages which have merged together over the years.It is hard to decide where one begins and one ends.Once there was a lot of work in this area _ coal mines,quarries,a brickyard,a sawmill and a brewery.Now all of these are closed down.There is a lot of {waste land}broken up by farmers { {fields}growing things like peas,wheat and barley.Now most of the people work in Leeds or Wakefield.The jobs in Woodlesford/Oulton are mainly in the service industries _ like dinner ladies,cleaners and shop assistants.We also have a {sports centre}close by.The{Aire and Caulder canal}passes through Woodlesford,as well as the { {London/Glasgow railway.}The {M.62.}is less than 2 miles away.
